message: A number of people have hooked up here with running partners etc.  I'm looking for some guys, (or girls) who want to hit the hotel gym, and do some lifting.  There's not a lot here but I got in a decent workout with the dumbells, and did bring my own speed rope.

I didn't check out the hotel facilities. Do they have any barbell / plates etc?  I mainly do the "big three" -- squat, deadlift and bench, but if you have any ideas or suggestions for a dumb-bell workout, i'm game.
I might be coming too :) had a late night, so might hit the gym after the event is over
ok folks, I'm going down at about 6:45  I will be wearing turquoise shorts, a yellow shirt and I have a long beard
maybe I should have said "people"  seriously, someone here must lift?
I'll be in the armchairs near the part of the lobby leading to the gym.
I should have brought my jumprope. I originally wanted to do a decent run, but I don't think I can wake up, get to the park, run, get back and shower before the conf starts tomorrow.

ok lets hit the gym in the morning, we can meet in the lobby, I did hit upper body the other day, no plates, there is a leg press with hydraulics, I'm thinking jump rope, wall squats, lunges and some other stuff
I will have the jumprope so you can't miss me, if I don't see anyone by 7:05 I'll wander in the gym.  I'm Brian.
My goal is to meet you there! That is early for me, but a necessity to make it to the conference events on time. =)
